mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_investment a WHERE a.investment_id = b.`ID` AND a.yn = 1)num, (SELECT MAX(f.yn)s FROM follow_investment f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f.investment_id = b.`ID` GROUP BY f.investment_id )yn FROM investment_institutions b WHERE short_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT ii.id, ii.short_name, ii.create_time, ii.type, ii.logo, ii.kenel_case, a.cc FROM investment_institutions ii INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) cc,ps.investment_institutions_id FROM projects ps LEFT JOIN project_financing_log pfl ON ps.id = pfl.project_id WHERE pfl.financing_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} AND ps.investment_institutions_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ps.investment_institutions_id ORDER BY cc DESC )a ON ii.id = a.investment_institutions_id AND ii.logo IS NOT NULL AND ii.logo != '' WHERE ii.type = 1 ORDER BY a.cc DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}

select ii.id, ii.short_name, ii.create_time, ii.type, ii.logo, ii.kenel_case, a.cc from investment_institutions ii INNER join ( select count(*) cc,ps.investment_institutions_id from (select * from projects where serial_number < 500000 union all select * from projects where serial_number > 500000 and continent != '国外') ps left join project_financing_log pfl on ps.id = pfl.project_id where pfl.financing_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and ps.investment_institutions_id is not null group by ps.investment_institutions_id order by cc desc )a on ii.id = a.investment_institutions_id and ii.logo is not null and ii.logo != '' order by a.cc desc
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}
